name: Project.99_1708
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 2 games.

[proveDNA] by Jaehyun Yoo

Fight the genetic algorithm that learns your best!

[MATH GAM3] by Jaewon Yoo, Jooeun Hwang, Sun Park

This is a math game. You can swap any numbers in the screen.  3V3RY NUMB3R5.
